item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
PACÍFICO

We came to PACÍFICO last winter for our toy drive which was coordinated by Liz and people enjoyed the drinks, food, and ambiance. I've had some very good sangria there.

Drink Specials:
$7 sangria and mohitos ($1 off); $5 beers.

Food:
Appetizers will be made larger than the usual size for the NHC

Please be sure to RSVP early for this HH!

Contact is Karen (203-535-8751)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.name: 10/15 Monday Happy Hour at Pacifico
